org.araneaframework.framework.router
Class BaseExpiringServiceRouterService

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.framework.router.BaseServiceRouterService
              org.araneaframework.framework.router.BaseExpiringServiceRouterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, java.io.Serializable, Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardThreadServiceRouterService, StandardTopServiceRouterService
public abstract class BaseExpiringServiceRouterService
extends BaseServiceRouterService

Router service that kills child services after specified period of inactivity is over. This implementation checks for child services whose lifetime has expired only when servicing request.

Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
See Also:

Field Detail

SERVICE_TTL_MAP

public static final java.lang.String SERVICE_TTL_MAP
OutputData key under which expiring service lifetime expectancies are stored. This should be a Map <Object router_service_key, Long timeToLive>

action

protected void action(Path path,

Description copied from class: BaseServiceRouterService
Uses the map to route the request to the service under getServiceId(input). The id of the service is determined by getServiceId(input). If the service id cannot be determined then the default id is used set via setDefaultServiceId(Object).
